Name: Blood Orange Margarita
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
RIM glass with salt (moisten outside edge with lime or orange juice and dip into salt).
Prepare garnish of blood orange slice wheel.
Review: Notes of tequila, orangey triple sec, bittersweet liqueur, blood orange and lime juice all sit in perfect kilter in this tasty riff on the classic Margarita .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2000 by Ben Davidson in Sydney, Australia. Margarita cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of Blood Orange Margarita contains 138 calories
